column4: Is anyone experiencing problems with dpkg. When installing/upgrading I get an error message:dpkg: parse error, in file `/var/lib/dpkg/status' near line 20394 package `libglu1-mesa-dev':
field name `(Includes' must be followed by colon
looks like the file is corrupt - did you lose power during dpkg?
sadly, the apt status file is unique to your machines configuration, I'd be looking at reinstalling
